p: In the present study daily administration of (1%) of H 2O 2 by gavage significantly increased the levels of LDH, ALT, AST, however, rats receiving H 2O 2 with Argan oil or Syzygium aromaticum essential oil emulsified in Argan oil had lower levels of LDH, ALT and AST in comparison with H 2O 2 groups. The increase of ALT and AST is an index of liver damage and alterations of liver function due to the release of these enzymes into the bloodstream from the cytosol [ 37, 38].
